function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases from indigenous communities","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to Nomad lodges staff and guests","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide medical resources, and educate staff on disease prevention","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote health monitoring, and contactless check-in systems","People":"Nomad lodges staff, guests, and indigenous community members","Owner":"Nomad lodges management and healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Unsanitary conditions from local schools and communities","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to harmful bacteria and viruses","Mitigation":"Provide sanitation supplies and support local community sanitation efforts","Technologies":"Sanitation stations, water purification systems, and waste management solutions","People":"Nomad lodges staff, students, and community members","Owner":"Nomad lodges management and community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness about disease prevention and containment","Impact":"Risk of inadequate response to potential disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Conduct education and training programs on disease prevention and containment","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual training modules, and remote workshops","People":"Nomad lodges staff, guests, and local community members","Owner":"Nomad lodges management and public health organizations"}]}
